Part 6 was released in Japan on December 30, 2021. For now, the only way to get it is to pay ¥1,078 for it, but it IS released already. From what I could gather, Glasses regrets having sex with Short-Hair, but Blonde and the other Blonde have fully embraced each other (which is basically no different than parts 1-5).
